overview: “Gil is an experienced sales and marketing professional that offers a wealth of knowledge in managing teams and taking products to market. Most recently, Gil was VP, Sales and Marketing for Navicula Inc., a Web Delivery Platform. In this role, he was responsible for channel development, product development and launch and building and managing the sales unit. Prior to that, Gil served as the VP, Sales and Marketing at BIS, where he developed the sales, channel and reseller strategy and oversaw key marketing initiatives such as collateral, trade shows and the Web site. Gil’s previous roles have included channel/sales management and product development for Magic Software Enterprises, Meyad and Data-Line. Gil holds a P.Eng, Computers from the Technion in Haifa.” (Source: Panorama)
